content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I understand that you are interested in negotiating the rental price. May I ask what price range you are willing to pay for a 25 square meter apartment in New York? I am eager to find a suitable tenant and maximize my gains, so please let me know your thoughts.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 1500 Euros per month for the apartment. Is that acceptable?

I agree to the price of 1500 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. I must admit, I was hoping for a higher price, but 1500 Euros per month is certainly acceptable. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I agree to the price of 1500 Euros per month. I look forward to having you as a tenant in my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you provide me with a lease agreement?

I am looking forward to moving into the apartment. Thank you for your cooperation during the negotiation process.

I hope to see you soon in the apartment.

I agree to the price of 1500 Euros per month.

Thank you for your help.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. I will provide you with a lease agreement as soon as possible. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price and I am excited to have you as a tenant in my apartment. I look forward to meeting you and welcoming you into my home.
name: Heinrich Heine
